Replace.Text: Why didn’t I say it earlier? Why did I just tell me now?
Meaningless things
Sifangyuan is willing to give you some special rights, but this is not my idea...
Well, I understand
I've told those people long ago not to waste time on you
Don't try to touch a hair of me!
You shouldn't exist in this world!
Let them come in and sit by themselves, and I still have to do research...
Please ask other people in Sifangyuan, I'm not available.
Researchers from Sifang Academy are heading to your territory, hoping that you can entertain these people well
A vulgar person dares to speak rudely
Shameless person!
How many times have I taught you, why do you still get it wrong? Take them all back and review them again... Hello, what's the matter with me
Are you here to visit Sifangyuan, just follow me
Yes, yes
where u from? Can you mark the location on the map?
Are so many troops coming to attack us?
Really? Why don't I believe it
Your expansion has affected us
Since that's the case, I have nothing to say
It is not a joke to steal the secrets of Sifangyuan. I advise you not to do this again next time
I have nothing to say, either
When will your religious people leave?
If it weren't for this body...
Happy cooperation, it's good for both of us
Happy cooperation, it's good for both of us
Happy cooperation, it's good for both of us
Then forget it
Then forget it
Then forget it
It's ridiculous that I actually discussed international affairs with a guy who has no qualities.
Zhiming scoffed at your lowly cultural values
The initial intelligence advantage of Zhiming (Miankong Winter Meaning)
Use the Deep Space Eye Leader Zhiming (Warm Winter Meaning)
The diplomat from the Sifangyuan sent you a secret message
Zhiming (warm winter meaning)
Well...why are you like a child...? childish.
The water is not full

In addition to having the leadership skills of Mystery Zhiming, you will initially obtain +4 [ICON_VisLimited] diplomatic visibility. Upgraded units will not end their rounds. All units ignore the terrain and the [ICON_Movement] movement penalty across rivers. When you board and disembark, there is no movement power consumption. After attacking, you can move [ICON_Movement]. After studying {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME}, all units have the ability to enter coastal and marine cells. Mass-production Mystery is -5 [ICON_Gold] gold coins per round, but the purchase fee is -100%. Territory espionage - level 4. When the offensive spy mission is successful, you will get 1000% of the [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Faith] belief values ​​in the target city. The time for spies to complete all tasks is reduced by 100% and it does not take time to deploy in enemy cities. The effect of inciting riots is increased by 100, {LOC_BUILDING_LIBRARY_NAME}+1 spy capacity. All cities +10% [ICON_Production] productivity, water cells +2 [ICON_Food] food +2 [ICON_Production] productivity, every cell you pass through, it provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins +1 [ICON_Production] productivity +1, and each polity will get an additional universal slot. [ICON_GreatWork_Writing]Work +3[ICON_Food]Food +3[ICON_Production]Performance +3[ICON_Gold]Gold, Palace +2[ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture]Graduate Work Slot, Monument +3[ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture]Graduate Work Slot. All cities were created with an additional downtown building (ancient times were monuments)
What is the durability of magnetic lining plate under natural action? Huh...I naturally know this, but I don't want to tell you now. Think about it yourself. ——Zhi Ming
Knowledgeable
Dislike civilizations with low cultural values
[COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]-5[ICON_Gold] Gold Coins (maintenance fee) [ENDCOLOR], from Zhengming's Leadership Feature
